entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wasm test failure: Unable to evaluate script: target frame detached #102957
  • Wasm test failure: System addon update list error SyntaxError: XMLHttpRequest.open #102955

Closed

  • Perf_Single/Double.TryParse regressions #102865
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder writes incorrect type names to generated assembly for nested types #102777
    9.0.0
  • Reevaluate HW intrinsic immediate const parameters after method containing HW intrinsics is inlined #11138
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] Avoid method call to fallback intrinsic method if immediate arg becomes constant #9989
    Future
  • Strange JMP over NOP in try-catch-finally #102013
  • RyuJIT generates unnecessary null check #4324
    Future
  • .dbg in ilcompiler package #102684
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Low-level runtime shutdown event for critical cleanup #62834
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: custom "Ignore" conditions on properties #102945
  • [API Proposal]: Employ `allows ref struct` in libraries #102671
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • need to account for unsuccessful commit case when hardlimit isn't on #102961
    area-GC-coreclr
  • HttpIOException when establishing connection, unobserved task exception #102960
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Better createdump error message for single-file apps for heap or triage dump types. #102959
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • WIP: Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #102956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding a default IEnumerable.GetEnumerator implementation to IEnumerable<T> #102954
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix build on alpine arm64 #102953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add retry loop around Process.Kill(entireProcessTree: true) #102958
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix regression in Number.NumberBuffer.cs #102950
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix bug in referencing nested type in IL #102933
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Allow shuffle and other hwintrinsic that require a constant to stay intrinsic if the operand becomes constant later #102827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove debug symbols from non-symbols ilc package #102803
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete VectorT size constants from minipal/cpufeatures #102946
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Baseline failing pri-1 JIT tests #102944
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `where T : allows ref struct` in runtime #102795
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: GetActiveElementCount #102813
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2464916 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • ILCompiler.pkgproj: remove 'runtime.json' when DotNetBuildSourceOnly. #102908
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • refactor: rename COMPlus classes to make a clear distinction with COM interop #102922
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 4 #102921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add gcinfodumper implementation. #102920
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • Experiment - Remove space restriction from XarchIntrinsicConstants #102913
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [Release/8.0-staging] Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102530
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Rewrite the corehost CMake system to be more "Modern CMake"y and less MSBuild-y #102475
    area-Host
  • Fix SIMD12 spills #102736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrating EsrpCodeSigning Task From Version 4 to Version 5 #102948
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-01
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Update llvm to 18.1.3 and emscripten to 3.1.54 #2595

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Executables compiled with x86 cannot be run because CLI and VS default to x64 version of the SDK #9327
    Backlog

Updated

  • Container tests started failing with the runtime insertion #41272
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works appears to be failing flakily #39960
  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Private dependencies appear in an app's deps.json file #39400

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Blazor] Removes problematic system.text.json switches #41322
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • CSharpScript with Single File .NET6 .NET7 .NET8 #73820

Updated

  • Cannot use CSharpScript API with PublishSingleSingle option #50719
    Backlog
  • CSharpScript speed (or lack of) #16897
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Build interval tree from sorted nodes #73819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix build host when only the .net 6 SDK is installed #73818
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24281.3 #73817
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Optimize helper we use to determine the relevant node of a particular kind the user is on. #73812
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce Linq usage in SymbolDisplayVisitor.CreateAliasMap #73793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to workspace service to ensure the analyzer loader uses streams on linux #73809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding WebAssembly to Blazor Web App template fails: dotnet.js not found #56013
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56012
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef #56011
  • Large remote videos fail to load in Blazor #56005

Closed

  • [System.Text.Json] Serializer loses precision on ulong #52393
    Backlog
  • Lazy Loading separate Razor Class Library project in Blazor Web App #55985
  • Perf regression: fortunes #56001
  • ee84ffdd685e0b8ebe1e61e44d47ac7e69d0d146 #56009
  • Better UX - show "loading" (anything) while app is starting up the .NET WebAssembly runtime (for AutoRender, prerender false) #55997
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56002
  • Perf regression: mapaction, multiple_queries #55976
  • Perf improvement: json #56000
  • ResultContext<TOptions>.Result missing nullable annotation #45594
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump update-dotnet-sdk action #56010
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `268817f` #56008
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d83fee1` to `a7f443b` #56007
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d83fee1` to `a7f443b` #56006
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Add nullable annotation to ResultContext<TOptions>.Result #55948
    community-contribution, area-security, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add HTML title attribute to "th" elements #55837
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [OutputCaching] OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices is always null during initialization #55847
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Backport #51506 to .NET 8 #55865
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 8.0.x
  • Unquarantine FrameworkParametersCompletionProviderTests #55857
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • project.assets.json contains invalid targets #22780
  • Add API for AddLogicalChild that can also be used to set the inherited binding context #22779
    .NET 8 SR7

Closed

  • [Android] VisualDiagnostics/IWindowOverlay with Shell still has issues loading #17677
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Fix BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #19142
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Simplify and make more robust the process for Single-instance WinUI apps #9973
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Subscribe less pointer events in `UpdatingGestureRecognizers` #22781
    community ✨
  • [Android] TabBar navigate back on current tab #22778
    community ✨
  • Entry fields do not work correctly if bound to a numeric property from a ViewModel - fix #22777
    community ✨

Merged

  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
    area-controls-shell
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area-xaml, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • [Housekeeping] Fix Issue22433Test #22753
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Updated

  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Label.CharacterWrap wraps text too soon - fix #22728
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Windows] Set `CanDrag` and `AllowDrop` only if needed #22640
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, t/perf
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS - Fix #22655
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid optimization of `CASE op WHEN` expressions #33867

PullRequests

  • Fix `unhex()` nullability #33870
  • Fix optimization of `CASE op WHEN` #33869
